title: Portfolio Website
description: A modern portfolio website built with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript. Features a built-in admin panel for managing projects.
content:
## Overview
This portfolio website was designed to showcase my journey as a computer engineering student. It features a custom-built admin panel for easy content management.

### Tech Stack
- Next.js 16 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS v4
- Framer Motion

### Key Features
- **Admin Control Panel**: Add/Edit/Delete projects.
- **Dynamic Animations**: Subtle background effects.
- **Responsive Design**: Mobile-first approach.

title: Article Network Analysis Tool
description: A desktop application that parses article and author data to visualize citation and collaboration networks using Graph Theory algorithms.
content:
## Overview
Developed a desktop application that parses article and author data from JSON files. It builds graph structures representing citation and collaboration networks and implements graph algorithms to compute H-index and betweenness centrality.

### Key Features
- **Graph Algorithms**: H-index, Betweenness Centrality.
- **Visualization**: WPF interface for network visualization.
- **Data Parsing**: Efficient handling of JSON datasets.

title: LIDAR Scan Visualization
description: A visualization program to render spatial points from LIDAR data using SDL graphics.
content:
## Overview
Parsed LIDAR point data from files and processed angle calculations to create a visualization of 2D/3D space.

### Key Features
- **SDL3 Rendering**: Efficient graphics rendering.
- **Data Processing**: Parsed raw LIDAR point data.
- **Memory Management**: Optimized for smooth performance.

title: Tower Defense Game
description: A simple tower defense game utilizing object-oriented programming principles.
content:
## Overview
Created a simple tower defense game using Java. The project focused on implementing object-oriented patterns for game entities.

### Key Features
- **Game Logic**: Enemy movement, tower attacks, and scoring.
- **OOP Design**: Clean class structure.
- **UI**: Basic user interface for game state.

title: High School Results Web Portal
description: A web page to display and search through Libyan high school results for 2025.
content:
## Overview
Designed a web page to display Libyan high school results for 2025. It loads and parses JSON datasets to render student results dynamically.

### Key Features
- **Dynamic Rendering**: Client-side JSON parsing.
- **Clean Layout**: Improved visual presentation compared to government sites.
